attributes.action: bring in a road-chargeing system in both Banbury and Oxford city centers to cut the heavy trafic levels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most of the week will see both Banbury and Oxford city centers paralised with heavy trafic. A £5 road-toll would help put people off of using thier cars and help pay for some urgently needed foot-bridges or under-passes.
